wikipedia_page.main: Paul Bradley Carr (born 7 December 1979) is a British writer, journalist and commentator, based in San Francisco. He has also—as he wrote on his official website—"edited various publications and founded numerous businesses with varying degrees of abysmal failure."

response: *Paul Carr (musician), English guitarist and member of the James Taylor Quartet
*Paul Carr (rugby league) (born 1967), rugby league footballer of the 1990s for Scotland, South Sydney Rabbitohs, and Sheffield Eagles

Absinthe is a live show that premiered in 2006 and is playing on the forecourt of Caesars Palace, Las Vegas, after opening on April 1, 2011. Paul Carr of The Huffington Post, proclaimed "If I could only see one show my entire life," he said, "I'd want it to be that." It was also called "The Greatest Show In Vegas History" by Las Vegas Weekly
